column4: If I just installed Ubuntu 7.10 and updated it all is it a good idea for me to install and run Automatix?
If I just installed Ubuntu 7.10 and updated it all is it a good idea for me to install and run Automatix?
its a better idea to forget you ever HEARD about automatix at all.
i normaly install the nvidia drivers,   run sudo nvidia-settings --twinview, restart X, then tweak the setup with sudo nvidia-xconfig
i may have that backwards.. :)   run sudo nvidia-xconfig --twinview, then sudo nvidia-settings
i was gunna say gave me a unrecognized option
its weird.. the X gui command has NO X in the command.. while the text based tool.. has a X in the name. :)
nvidia-xconfig -A   to see all the options
is that a good way to do so?
you DID backup your original xorg.conf  ? i hope.
or logout and use 'restart x server'  in the menus
Fizz= new to linux, which means not used to backups
ill restart X now....i hope it works....
that seemed to work out just nicely
i found the cube effect combined with  multi monitors..  to be.. lacking :)
of course i find the cube to be a bit on the  useless side anyway
